nodes.text: Meeka Reen was a Human female. She led a group of Jerne guerrillas who opposed the Galactic Empire's rule of the planet.

Upon learning of the Eternity Crystal supposedly hidden near Adony Station, Reen and her troops helped Luke Skywalker and Leia Organa take control of the station, so they could search. When she thought the pair had found the crystal's location, she betrayed them, desiring it for herself. Unfortunately, there was no crystal, merely a bomb planted by Darth Vader. It exploded, killing Meeka and the remnants of her guerrillas.
